text: is a Korean-Japanese billionaire technology businessman, investor, and philanthropist. He is the founder and chief executive officer (CEO) of the Japanese holding company SoftBank, CEO of SoftBank Mobile and chairman of UK- based Arm Holdings. According to Forbes magazine, Son's net worth is US$23 billion, and he is the second richest man in Japan. In 2016, Son founded the Masason Foundation alongside Nobel Prize laureate Shinya Yamanaka to provide resources to emerging youth innovators worldwide. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean businesspeople Category:Businesspeople from Tokyo
title: Masayoshi Son
